snippet: The 2014 Mazda 6 hews to the automaker's latest design concept known as Kodo and will be introduced to the North American market at the Los Angeles auto show in November.
abstract: The 2014 Mazda 6 hews to the automaker's latest design concept known as Kodo and will be introduced to the North American market at the Los Angeles auto show in November.

headline.main: A First Glimpse of the 2014 Mazda 6 Comes in Moscow
